title: ISic001489. Dedication to Hermes
body:
1Φάλακρος http://sicily.classics.ox.ac.uk/alists/listglyph.xml#triple-colon Θευδώρου
2Ἑρμᾶι http://sicily.classics.ox.ac.uk/alists/listglyph.xml#triple-colon ἀνέθηκε

1ΦΑΛΑΚΡΟΣhttp://sicily.classics.ox.ac.uk/alists/listglyph.xml#triple-colonΘΕΥΔΩΡΟΥ
2ΕΡΜΑΙhttp://sicily.classics.ox.ac.uk/alists/listglyph.xml#triple-colonΑΝΕΘΗΚΕ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on autopsy

English translation

Phalakros son of Theudoros dedicated (this statue) to Hermes

Italian translation

Phalacros, figlio di Theudoros, ad Hermes dedicò

commentary

bibliography

  • 04.0035 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 183 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Gabrici NSA 1925 421 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Langlotz 1943 abb.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001891
  • De Waele 1971 32-33 no.3 pl.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002040
  • Griffo 1987 188 fig.163 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001934
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
